name: Lanturn
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp.

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may change Lanturn’s type to {W} until the end of your turn. This power can’t be used if Lanturn is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed. If Lanturn becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed after you have used this power, its type changes back to {L}.

attacks.name: Blinding Light
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
